name: Soarin' Scurry
description:
SOARIN' SCURRY

Our game was recently shown with our custom controllers at MAGFest, however...

In this online version, all you need is your keyboard!

Controls -

Player 1:
LEFT STOMP: Z
RIGHT STOMP: X
LEFT FLAP: S
RIGHT FLAP: DPlayer 2:
LEFT STOMP: C
RIGHT STOMP: V
LEFT FLAP: K
RIGHT FLAP: L

Player 1 uses their flap keys to navigate menus, and uses their left stomp to select. Both players need to hit left stomp until the READY text is displayed to confirm they are ready to move to the next screen.

Soarin' Scurry is a two-player racing game where you get to use your body as a controller. Step onto your bright neon Bird Pad and don your Wing Connectors to get into action. Frantically stomp your feet and flap your arms to make your way across lush, vibrant neon levels which will truly test your avian abilities. Land your bird on the Finish Square first for victory (and bragging rights)!

Created by:

Nikolas Wood

Miki Straus

Michelle Pineda

dolphindungeon.com
